item.title: On GNU/Linux and Ricing
item.author: Cliford
item.description: Intro No blog of mine is complete without a rant (and/or flex) about GNU/Linux and my choice of distro (take a guess). An introduction to the terms mentioned here for any uninitiated (non-existent) readers:- GNU/Linux (popularly and arguably known as Linux): An open-source operating system (which can be free) Rice: a swamp grass which is widely cultivated as a source of food Now that we have the essential information, we can get on to the story of how my experience with Linux led me to start a tech-repair empire by “putting it in rice”.
